wordpressPost.title: Spiritualized with Oslo Philharmonic at Øya
wordpressPost.excerpt: Lana Del Rey, Young Thug, Testament, Danny Brown, Bel Canto, SIBIIR and many others also play in Tøyenparken this day.
wordpressPost.content:
Wednesday 9th of August you’ll be able to experience a festival concert outside the ordinary in our Sirkus tent. Spiritualized will share the stage with the Oslo Philharmonic. It’s one of the few concerts the band will do in this format.

Many thanks to the Oslo Philharmonic and the Traces Gospel Choir for their participation, and to the Oslo Concert Hall supplying venue for practice ahead of the concert.

ABOUT SPIRITUALIZED AND OSLO PHILHARMONIC
